phrs.translation: 欧莱雅, 眼端的, 欧莱雅集团, 劳拉
天网公司, 劳拉天网, 劳拉天网卫星公司, 美国劳拉

sentences.sentence: Space Systems Loral, which builds commercial satellites, had a 16 percent jump in the value of its personal property last year.
sentences.translation: 劳拉，建立商业卫星，空间系统在其个人财产的价值去年跃升16%。

sentences.sentence: S. did not want to see a Chinese rocket being used to launch the Loral satellite. Hence, the contract was not implemented and the $150 million deposit has not been refunded.
sentences.translation: 但是美国有关方面不同意，因此这个合同至今没有兑现，1.3亿美元也没有退还。
